Background:

I was born and raised in Miami, FL. After high school I moved up to Boston attended Boston University's Communication School. For the past 5 years I have worked primarily in marketing and sales both stateside and abroad. Recently I made the realization that my true destiny lies within Search Marketing and Social Media, where I can assist dynamic companies in saving valuable money by efficiently leveraging Google Advertising, and Search Engine Optimization. I hope one day to to return to his home to open a own search agency to assist in the recovery of Miami's job economy and make a difference in my community.
